item.title: Beyond Redundancy: Information-aware Unsupervised Multiplex Graph Structure Learning
item.description: InfoMGF, a novel framework, tackles the limitations of unsupervised multiplex graph learning by refining graph structures, maximizing task-relevant information (both shared and unique), and achieving …
